name: A miniature silver pocketwatch
data: It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers extremely fast.
It functions as a magical timepiece, unless broken.
